Earthquake Mapper, enables the visualisation of earthquake data collected by The United States Geological Survery (USGS). The app has a marker mode which will place a marker at the location of each earthquake. The larger the marker, the higher the magnitude. The app also contains a heatmap mode which will allow you to observe the concentration of earthquakes, as opposed to the location and magnitude of each earthquake.

Earthquake mapper also contains:
• A customisable color preference (found in the preferences), which allows you to modify the color of focused/unfocused markers.
• A preference to allow you to modify the number of earthquakes processed.
• Only the most significant earthquakes from 1950 to today (About 20,000).
